full_summary:
### Contract Notice

**External Laboratory Services to Monitor the Environment of the National Research Council Canada's Clinical Trial Manufacturing Facility**

**Request for Proposal (RFP) Reference Number: 23-58226**

The contract notice is closed. However, applicants can still review the RFP document.

### Tender Details

*   **RFP Reference Number:** 23-58226
*   **Title:** External Laboratory Services to Monitor the Environment of the National Research Council Canada's Clinical Trial Manufacturing Facility
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
*   **Notice Status:** Closed
*   **Notice Date:** 27 February 2024
*   **Proposal Submission Deadline:** 22 March 2024 (14:00:00 EST)

### Objective

The National Research Council Canada (NRC) is seeking Proposals to provide External Laboratory Services to monitor the environment of the Clinical Trial Manufacturing Facility (CTMF).

### Background

To meet the Good Manufacturing Practices (GMP) regulations, a certain number of samples must be tested in order to meet the expectations for Grade C and D rooms. Proposals are invited to provide laboratory services to analyze these samples, including active, passive, and surface samples.

### Proposal Submission

Proposal must be submitted electronically through the Canadabuys portal. A copy of the RFP document can be accessed via the following links:

[\*English\[](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32869/npp_en_fr_26feb_.pdf)\[\*](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32869/npp_en_fr_26feb_.pdf)[\*French\[](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32869/rfp_external_laboratory_service_to_monitor_the_environment_27_feb_final.pdf)\[\*](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32869/rfp_external_laboratory_service_to_monitor_the_environment_27_feb_final.pdf)
